However, access to particular folders can be restricted. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study the articles under \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/Rft9Mg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SoftArchive\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn what SoftArchive is and how a user can access particular folder.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
